城市数据开放沙龙

Feb 11, 2014

#92 Divvy Data II

Following up on the successful Divvy Data hack night last summer, Steven Vance and other developers will share what they have created to analyze station locations, track rides, and use hardware to know bike/station availability.

Elliot Greenberger from Divvy will also be making a special announcement.

Links

  • Bike Sharing Data Hackpad (official resource)
  • Divvy Data Challenge
  • Capital Bikeshare Hackers Pedal Their Wares at Mobility Lab

6pm
Feb 11, 2014

Braintree office
222 W Merchandise Mart Plz 8th Floor
Chicago, IL

Food provided by Code for America
Read our Code of Conduct

Video
Christopher Whitaker from the Smart Chicago Collaborative records and livestreams our presentations. Watch them on YouTube!
